EmailTemplate.name: 202011_Americas_VBACE.Winner Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations! VBACE Honeywell Amazon Gift Card
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Congratulations!
We’re thrilled to announce that your name was drawn in our VBACE raffle for the Amazon Gift card.
While we missed greeting you in person, we wanted to say thank you for attending the Honeywell virtual booth last week at VBACE and for registering for our Amazon gift card raffle.
Look for email from Kathy.Phoenix@honeywell.com for the Amazon link to download your gift card. Enjoy the gift and we wish you a very safe and healthy holiday season.
Kindly,
Honeywell Aerospace – VBACE Team
